name: City Construction Road builder Simulator 2016 – free heavy excavator crane dumper bulldozer roller operator driver digger sim
name_original: City Construction Road builder Simulator 2016 – free heavy excavator crane dumper bulldozer roller operator driver digger sim
description:
Welcome to Building Construction Road Simulator 2016!
In this City construction simulator game you go to a construction site where the work is never boring! Construction worker games are fun for everyone, this road builder game combines loads of different games together, like an excavator simulator or a road construction game. City construction simulator 3D will offer you real work fun. City Road Construction is the best city construction simulator and the best of the city building and construction simulator games online!

Building Construction Road Simulator 2016 Game Features:

- For beginners and pros easy controls
- Realistic construction city 3D feeling
- Construction worker animations
- Real Experience of Driving Heavy Vehicles
Explore the Off Road Construction Site
- Real-time Physics for Driving Heavy Construction Vehicles
- Explore the Construction Site environment
